page.title: 07PARKING AND AIRPORTS
page.content: There are an adequate number of car parks in the two main shopping areas,Wilmslow and Alderley Edge."Pay and Display" units are set up to ensure that this facility is not {abused.}At the two railway stations there is a{limited}amount of{free {parking space}for travellers who commute to work each day. Some of the traffic passing through Wilmslow goes to{Manchester {International Airport}at{ {Ringway,}about 3 miles away.It is the third{largest airport}in{Britain. Planes travel from Manchester to {America}and to most{European {countries.}In 1985 the news that Stansted was to be extended worried officials at M.I.A. but the actual government proposals have not been as bad as was at first thought.
